channel.title: Data Channel on Pion
channel.description: Recent content in Data Channel on Pion

item.title: WebRTC Data Channels in Go
item.description: Today we’ll walk through setting up a Data Channel connection in Go using pions/webrtc. Check out our knowledge base articles on WebRTC if you’re new to it. You can also skip to the full examples if you just want to look at the code. Preparation Let’s quickly cover how to get started with pions/webrtc. If you’re familiar with Go you can skip to the next section. To start you can download the library using go get: go get github.
